meanings.definition: Not having been removed from a mold.
meanings.sent1: The unmolded chocolate still had the shape of the mold.
meanings.sent2: The unmolded clay retained the imprint of the container.
meanings.sent3: The unmolded jello wobbled in the shape of the mold, looking quite funny.
meanings.sent4: Her unmolded thoughts were still confined within the boundaries of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unmolded ice sculpture glistened in the sunlight, frozen in its mold.

meanings.definition: Not having been shaped or formed.
meanings.sent1: The unmolded dough was still a shapeless blob.
meanings.sent2: The unmolded metal lacked any defined structure.
meanings.sent3: The unmolded playdough looked like a colorful mess, waiting to be shaped.
meanings.sent4: Her unmolded plans needed more structure before they could be put into action.
meanings.sent5: The unmolded sandcastle slowly crumbled back into a shapeless pile.

meanings.definition: Not having been released from a mold or container.
meanings.sent1: The unmolded gelatin dessert stayed in the container.
meanings.sent2: The unmolded candle remained stuck in its mold.
meanings.sent3: The unmolded soap refused to come out of the mold, causing a bit of a struggle.
meanings.sent4: Her unmolded emotions were trapped inside, waiting to be set free.
meanings.sent5: The unmolded ice cube clung to the sides of the tray, reluctant to be released.
